mapper.insert: insert into tb_wz_group_task_ratio (task_id, group_id, leader_percent) (select task_id, #{groupId}, #{leaderPercent} from tb_wz_task)
insert into tb_wz_group_task_ratio (task_id, group_id, leader_percent) (select #{taskId}, group_id, leader_percent from tb_wz_group)

task_id, group_id, leader_percent,

mapper.update:
